acupoint.standard_location: 在足背，当第1、2跖骨结合部之前凹陷中
acupoint.standard_location_en: On the dorsum of the foot, in the depression proximal to the 1st metatarsal space
acupoint.simple_method: 足背第一、二趾骨之间，往脚踝方向推，推到两骨交汇处的凹陷
acupoint.simple_method_en: On top of foot between big toe and 2nd toe. Slide finger toward ankle until you feel a depression where the bones meet.
acupoint.anatomical: 第一跖骨间隙的背侧；有足背静脉网，第一跖背动脉；布有腓深神经
functions: 疏肝理气 (soothe liver, regulate qi)
平肝熄风 (calm liver, extinguish wind)
清热利湿 (clear heat, drain dampness)
